scripts.start: yarn run build && yarn run serve
scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python && yarn run test-python
scripts.lint-python: flake8 webapp tests && black --check --line-length 79 webapp tests
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --output-style compressed --output static/css && postcss --map false --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.build: mkdir -p static/js && webpack && yarn run build-css
